bio: Oh hi! I'm ðŸ”¸Gen 7-Plodding ScarletðŸ”¸. In high school, I was voted biggest teacher's pet. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. We can be friends, but keep the ultra purrsonal stuff to yourself, please.
